SENSES.SENSE: a statement explaining what someone can or cannot do in a particular system, game, or situation<font color=blue> ex: They complain that businesses are being hampered by too many rules and regulations. </font>

the person, country, political or religious group, etc. that officially controls or governs a place<font color=blue> ex: He admitted there were killings under his rule but said reports were exaggerated. </font>
a statement or principle that describes the ways in which the words in a language can be used and combined<font color=blue> ex: complicated grammatical rules </font>
